text: "Calendar Girl" is a 1960 song by Neil Sedaka and was written by Howard Greenfield. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 8 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in Japan and Canada, number 7 in New Zealand and number 3 in Australia. It was named after the 1947 movie Calendar Girl and has been covered by other artists including The Beach Boys in 1978. ==References== Category:1960 songs Category:Neil Sedaka songs Category:Petula Clark songs Category:The Beach Boys songs Category:Tina Arena songs
title: Calendar Girl (song)
